summary: This mod simply adds a Mayan Pyramid in the center of the lake near Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=green][b]The Mayan Pyramid[/b][/color]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[b]Background[/b]

Some people say they saw a gigantic form through a thick cloud of smoke as well as having 
heard deafening noise in the middle of the lake near riverwood.

What really happened here ?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Description[/b]

- This mod simply adds a Mayan Pyramid in the center of the lake near Riverwood. [See screenshots]
- The pyramid itself is a place to discover, you can fast travel to it.
- There is no interior in the pyramid, the purpose is only esthetic for now [Please read what\'s next]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Future Update(s)[/b]

- I\'m planning to do an interior for the pyramid, and I have an idea of what to put inside [Surprise]
- If you have ideas for updates, or other ancient buildings I can do, 
  feel free to say it in the comments or PM me if you prefer.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please leave me a feedback of what you think, and endorse if you like this mod!
You can upload this file where you want, and do whatever you want with it, just credit me please.

[color=blue]514Y32[/color]
author: 514Y32
